hero.subtitle: Custom, responsive website – a confident presence from the start that attracts clients and is a long-term profitable investment.

about.heading: About Me
about.description:
Hi! I'm glad you're here. As a frontend developer, I help turn your ideas into real, well-functioning, and visually clean websites.

I place great emphasis on responsiveness and fast loading. I create websites that provide a convincing experience on every screen size.

I'm well-versed in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript languages. I work with Bootstrap framework and continuously expand my knowledge. Currently learning React.

I adapt flexibly to needs. I always strive to make every collaboration smooth and trust-based.

If you want a website that not only looks good but also works efficiently, you're in the right place!

career_about.heading: Introduction
career_about.description:
Hi! If you're looking for a motivated junior developer who is self-taught and has 2+ years of experience, you're in the right place. I acquired my knowledge through a structured, project-based learning path where I mastered every skill through real tasks.

On the Scrimba Front-End Developer career path, I've completed 50+ hours of interactive training videos, 80+ coding exercises, and numerous real projects so far. This isn't just theoretical knowledge, but practical experience – from blackjack games to complex JavaScript applications. I started learning React in 2025, which represents a new professional challenge.

What makes my approach special is that I learn every technology in small steps, through projects. I don't just know how to use CSS Grid – I also know when and why it's worth applying. The same goes for JavaScript or responsive design. I have basic knowledge in Laravel, which helps me understand frontend-backend communication.

As a junior developer, I approach every project with fresh perspective, high motivation, and continuous learning drive. If you're looking for a developer who knows the answer to the 'why' question and creates value with every line of code, let's talk!

hero.subtitle: Self-taught learning, 2+ years experience, project-based growth and reliable collaboration.

2023.title: Programming Journey Begins
2023.desc: Learning HTML5 and CSS3 fundamentals, discovering web technologies. Starting the Scrimba Front-End Developer career path with structured learning.

2023-2.title: JavaScript and Interactivity
2023-2.desc: ES6+ syntax, DOM manipulation, async/await – practical projects: Blackjack game, Chrome extension, interactive components.

2023-3.title: UI/UX and Responsive Design
2023-3.desc: Flexbox, CSS Grid, mobile-first thinking – complex layouts and visual hierarchy creation. Bootstrap framework mastery.

2024.title: Client Projects and Specialization
2024.desc: Completing first client commissions, developing real projects. Learning Laravel basics. Mastering Firebase and modern CSS frameworks.

2024-ongoing.title: Continuous Growth and React
2024-ongoing.desc: Active client projects, expanding professional experience. Started learning React in 2025 through the Scrimba course. Tailwind CSS, progressive web applications.

courses.heading: Learning Path in Detail
courses.intro: The Scrimba Front-End Developer career path is a 70+ hour interactive, project-based learning program where I mastered every skill through real tasks.

basic.title: 1. Basic Level – Web Dev Basics & CSS
basic.desc:
HTML5 semantic elements, CSS3 basics and box model, responsive mobile-first thinking, Flexbox and CSS Grid introduction.
Projects: Living the Simple Life blog, BBQ Splash Page, responsive portfolio pages.

intermediate.title: 2. Intermediate – Interactive JavaScript
intermediate.desc:
Modern ES6+ syntax, DOM manipulation, asynchronous operations (fetch, async/await), Promise handling.
Projects: Blackjack game, Chrome Dashboard extension, Pac-Man prototype, modal components.

advanced.title: 3. Advanced – UI Design & Advanced Layouts
advanced.desc:
UI Design principles (white space, contrast, typography), complex Grid and Flexbox layouts, Tailwind CSS.
Projects: Photo Gallery, Pokedex, Jeopardy game, responsive library application.

react.title: 4. React & Modern Development (started 2025)
react.desc:
React learning started in 2025 through the Scrimba course. Basics of functional components, introduction to hooks (useState, useEffect) – freshly started learning area.
Planned projects: Todo App, blog application, interactive components.

learningProjects.heading: Learning Projects
learningProjects.intro: Projects created during Scrimba courses and self-practice - stepping stones of development.

professionalProjects.intro: Client works that serve real needs.

contact.heading: Let's Connect
contact.intro: Have an idea or want to start a website? Write to me, and together we'll create what you really need.
contact.phoneNote: Available on weekdays between 9:00 AM and 6:00 PM.

careerContact.heading: Let's Discuss Opportunities
careerContact.intro: Looking for a motivated junior frontend developer for your team? With self-taught learning and 2+ years of experience, I'd be happy to show you how I can contribute to your company's digital goals. Let's talk about the details!
careerContact.phoneNote: Available on weekdays between 9:00 AM and 6:00 PM.
careerContact.messagePlaceholder: What position are you looking to fill? Tell me about the project and expectations…

fullSite.title: Complete Website Development
fullSite.desc: Modern, responsive websites according to your ideas – from basics or based on existing concepts.

frontendDev.title: Frontend Development
frontendDev.desc: Clean, structured HTML, CSS and JavaScript-based development that looks good and works well.

responsive.title: Mobile-Friendly Design
responsive.desc: Design that adapts to every screen size, ensuring visitors have a good experience anywhere.

structuredCode.title: Structured Code
structuredCode.desc: Transparent, reusable and easily maintainable code – planned for the long term.

animations.title: Animations and Interactions
animations.desc: Subtle effects, hover animations and scroll solutions that bring the site to life.

support.title: Technical Support
support.desc: Bug fixes, updates, follow-up assistance – reliable support even after development.

githubCta.text: Want to see more of my coding skills?

step1.title: Consultation
step1.desc: We discuss your ideas, needs, and goals so everything is tailored to your business.

step2.title: Planning
step2.desc: I create the website wireframe and style directions – thoughtfully designed from UX/UI perspective.

step3.title: Development
step3.desc: I create tested, responsive code with modern animations and clean frontend.

step4.title: Delivery
step4.desc: I make the final touches and support you in usage, and if needed, in further developments.
